sen.e: According to "The Tale of the Heike", the Heike clan tried to set up their base at Dazaifu, however the government buildings are damaged and lost with the war, it is said 'the Emperor had his temporary abode at 岩戸少卿, Tanenao OKURA's place".

sen.e: Although this 'secret box' was stolen by SHIMAZU clan and it is not known what was inside the box, it is considered the box might have contained a sacred sword (one of San-shu no jingi), which was believed to be lost in the sea at the battle of Dannoura.
